item.title: 黑客与画家
item.description: Why nerds are unpopular when we were in junior high school, my friend RICH And I I know a lot of people who were nerds in school,and they all tell the same story : there is a strong correlation between being smart and being a nerd , and an even stronger inverse correlation between being a nerd and being popular. Being smart seems to make you unpopular. why? To someone
